about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered what he was thinking? See for yourself...


Four’s POV covers all of the important Chapter 03 scenes from Four’s POV, ending at the emotional rooftop scene.

It’s important to note that the characters in POVs will act as if you took their route/path at every available opportunity, as well as assume a romance path in order to show the most content to fans.

content_descriptors.notes: A character is viciously stabbed and the other character slowly kills him through blunt force. It is referred to, but not shown through the art.
